thread.section_title: Better Life Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Life | www.cleanhappens.com
thread.title: Jeannine

author: Jeannine
title: Jeannine
text: I love your products! There is no chemical smell to make my husband and oldest son sneeze (they have allergies and are very sensitive to smells from cleaners,candles, perfumes,etc) and everything comes out just as clean as if I were using the chemical stuff. The wood polish cleans my dressers and makes them shine nice and the stain & odor remover is THE BEST!!! I originally had bought it at Target and was sad to find that they no longer carried it when I went back for more...I NEED this stuff! I have a 7yr old & a 3yr old who are always spilling drinks, dropping food, etc on my light colored couches. The smell is wonderful and I love that it's non toxic. I am a forever customer!
